title: The customer service was good
text: The customer service was good.  Although the shirt ran small for the ladies size, Queensboro honored the sale to ensure the fit was good.

title: I highly recommend Queensboro!
text: I appreciate the graphics team sending me the preview of my logo. It turned out so nice. It's high quality looking and I love it. It arrived super fast too.

title: So I got a custom patch and hat…
text: So I got a custom patch and hat promotion they run for like a "first time sample" type deal.The patch came out perfect, hats quality was great. The only reason I haven't gave it 5 stars is the price is too rich for me (a guy who does yt part time and makes 14$/hr)But other than that it was awesome

title: Order was redone and it turned out…
text: Order was redone and it turned out great, I recommend Queensboro for and thing that you wish to order. The embroidery is awesome.

title: Excellent customer service!
text: Items that were originally ordered came in but embroidery was not straight. I reached out to customer service, sent in a few pics and the messed up items were redone and sent out. No hassles, no problems. Excellent customer service!

title: itching excellent quality
text: The quality of the shirt and stitching is outstanding. I will be buying more. Working with the artists initially was very frustrating. I guess Queensboro.com can handle files that are large. Everyone I upped the original file that I use on app marketing material, it would only show up as a white  solid square.  I had to shrink the for size in order to submit it.

title: Embroidered Hats
text: Our hats are great quality and so is the embroidery.  Delivery was fast!

title: Great! But 1 suggestion
text: As always, a great experience!  Very easy to navigate the website and to order.  One suggestion, though.  It would be very helpful to have a longer time to order once a promotion has dropped.  It takes time to contact employees to ask if they’d like to order and to get their information.  We want everyone to have the opportunity to order your top-notch products!

title: Nice, but Pricey...
text: The garments are very nice.  They're quite overpriced, but they're nice.  The company stuck to their anticipated production date, and I appreciate that.

title: Company Shirt/Hat
text: The shirt turned out really good for the price. This was the first product I ordered from the company but I’ll definitely give them other try and order a few more custom apparel pieces.

title: So far, the replacements are looking good
text: So far, so good!  My previous 9 SportTek shirts all developed snags the first day I wore them, rendering them unwearable at work (embarrassing). Thankful your team offered to remake them with PortAuthority polos which your rep said was a more snag resistant.  The weave is similar but appears a bit tighter.  They just arrived yesterday.  I'll let you know how they perform.

title: Better Communication
text: Enjoy Queensboro products and have ordered multiple times. I had expectations with an Order on Dec 1st, logo approved Dec 5th that it would arrive by Christmas. Unfortunately, it shipped Dec 30th and received January 4th. Would be nice to have more communication of when to expect versus just "in line for production" or "in production" as it was "in production for what seemed like a week or more. Service has always been excellent.

title: My Honest Feedback; Both Good and Bad
text: I found the website easy to understand and navigate, the support staff very helpful and the quality very high. The turnaround time is VERY SLOW. I'm sure you'll lost orders due to that one factor. I think the pricing is high to be honest, but because you stand behind your products and are very good about replacing items a customer's not fully satisfied with - with no arguing required - you replace it. That's unusual and highly valued by ME. All in all, I give you 4 of 5 stars.

title: almost perfect
text: The embroidery quality is excellent. The sales and after sales support is fantastic. Your commitment to stand behind your products with your no-hassle guarantee is rare and exceptional. Your pricing may be a bit on the high side, but all things considered, I don't mind paying a bit extra for a quality product and experience. The one and only concern I have is with regard to turn-around time. It's quite long. If you could cut that in half, I'd be leaving 5 star reviews. Thank you!

title: Top Notch!
text: I have ordered several items from queens boro and the quality is top notch! They did a fantastic job with my embroidered logo. One hiccup was quickly solved when a piece of clothing was damaged during production they quickly emailed me to let me know they would be sending out another one asap.

title: Perfect
text: Perfect. Just as expected.  Thank you

title: Great sale price
text: Great sale price. I don't like making a big order or normal price to try out a new company or a product so this sale price was an easier risk to try Queensboro out.

title: We are very happy with your product

title: The embroidery is very good quality and…
text: The embroidery is very good quality and looks as expected. The shirts weren’t the best quality but I wasn’t expecting them to be top notch as they was very inexpensive. Overall happy with everything but if you are picky with material pick a better quality shirt that you know you love and trust the embroidery with your eyes closed because they are great.

title: Great work again!
text: I've been a customer for Queensboro for years and once again because of their excellent work I will continue to order from them in the future.  The one thing I will request next time is that the chest logo on the polo shirts be 1/2'-1 inch bigger.  Other than that, outstanding work.  Also, their processing and shipping has gotten Much, MUCH faster than when I first use them years ago.

title: Expensive but they finally got it right
text: Although it was an expensive venture for me, they finally got me the product I originally was trying to buy on the third try. I even sent them photos of what I was looking for and they said they do not sell that product. After two failed attempts, one of which was misprinted which I paid retail for both times, they finally sent me what I wanted from the start. Would have cost me about half if they had sold me what I finally received the first time.

title: Ready to put the order in and ship it.
text: Ready to put the order in and ship it.However we had some number issues too many xl shirts not enough medium size. The other issue again minor but the white part of the Washington Memorial should have been stitched white as well as the Swiss flag cross!

title: Product and pricing is always great
text: Product and pricing is always great, turnaround time is the main factor between using Queensboro or another vendor.  If we have all the time in the world we use you, if we need decent turnaround time we go somewhere else.

title: Your help line was the most important…
text: Your help line was the most important to me because when I had an issue the were right on top of the situation.  Quick response and very helpful.  The product was very nice and the embroidery was beautiful.  Looking forward to future purchases.

title: my Experience are good with Queensboro…
text: my Experience are good with Queensboro if you want a good thing you may go tthere

title: My first experience
text: This was my first time ordering with Queensboro. Although it was frustrating at first, the people I interacted tried there best to be accommodating. I gave 4 stars because when i interacted with someone via chat, i was told to leave what i wanted in the comment section. Unfortunately it was not read. I opted to chat again to make sure what i was requesting was ready for the shirt, it was not. I was able to get it pulled before it was actually put on the shirt. In the end the package did not arrive on the date that i needed, this was not Queensboro's error, this was an error with UPS. Queensboro, Please add the option to add more then two logos when ordering custom embroidered shirts. Now that I know what to expect, I would definitely order from Queensboro again. The shirts were beautiful!!

title: Just one suggestion..
text: Just one suggestion... make the size designation on the labels a little bigger so you can see them without a magnifying glass... small medium large extra large etc

title: Queensboro excellent products and services

From t-shirt and pens to mugs, key chain and drinkware, the offer ab wide verity of items that can be customized with your logo. Whatever your promotional needs may be Queensboro has you covered with an impressive selection.

title: The Great Experience...
text: The experience was great I order 7 logo T-shirts at a great price and they made my logo pop with all the different color shirts that I bought. The only thing that I didn't like is how long it takes to get your delivery due to they do not work on the weekends. Other than that I am going to order more T-shirts and add hats to my order.

title: Your sales and specials are very confusing
text: Your sales and specials are very confusing and seem a little misleading. It’s disheartening to make a purchase on sale, only to see the same item a week later for less.I like the products, quality of work and the no hassle customer service, but feel the bogo, sale, etc. are confusing.

title: Fine logo reproduction
text: This is a repeat order for us of caps with our company logo. They produce high quality goods for reasonable prices, with excellent customer service. My only issue was that the original color for our company logo is no longer available, but they worked with us to find a substitute color. The logo embroidery is otherwise an excellent reproduction.

title: The items look good and professional
text: The items look good and professional.  The time it took seemed a little long and the buttons on the woman's shirts aren't very flattering.  I originally ordered the v-neck shirts but I didn't see them in stock for this second order.

title: Have used Queensboro for years so I…
text: Have used Queensboro for years so I went to them for a special project. Went back and forth a couple times but the end result was very good. Satisfied again and definitely recommend them. They always have special prices to entice me.

title: Order System Needs Improvement
text: I should not have to put in a needed by date to keep my order from slipping out several weeks. I originally placed my order and the production date was 7 business days out. Then the date kept slipping by a few days each day as time went on until I finally reached out to say that I needed the order by a certain date (3 weeks after the original order date). then , and only then , did my order get put to the front of the production line and make it two me two days before the needed date. Either require a needed date or honor the first production date given, but don't push off already placed orders when you get in new rush orders. It's a bad look. The quality of the work however, was great!

title: I love the work y'all do
text: I love the work y'all do.  I find that the mistakes that happen with the embroidery have more to do with my roots using your system than they do with the system...But, and this was addressed, i ordered two shirts and they were really snug, so maybe a review option about, did it fit as expected.  Or a caveat that says, these run a bit small.

title: Very slow at the beginning of the…

One recent article was not perfect, and they did what they promised and immediately processed a no-hassle replacement.  The service is excellent.  Fulfillment is not the fastest in the market, but the quality of service is exceptional.

The order shipped 5 days later than estimated though meaning I received the order 15 days after ordering. This is the 2nd time my order has shipped later than expected, however I was not in a rush for the products so the 2+ week order delivery was not a problem for me; it was just unexpected.

title: White was see-through, company replaced for free.
text: *Edit* I did contact customer service and they were happy to replace the shirt with a different color for free. 10/10 for their customer service. The price was $75 for 4 shirts (on sale) which was nice. The shipping took a little long but not horrible, they did arrive before my anticipated date. The logos have yet to bend, they do lay flat as advertised. I do have 2 complaints though. 3 of the 4 shirts I ordered have strings poking out of the embroidery (upon receiving them), and the white shirt is very see-through. I feel uncomfortable wearing it without an undershirt, which defeats the purpose of having a cool breathable shirt in the Texas heat. I defiantly do not suggest ordering white. The sample photo of the white shirt looks like it won't be see-through, its misleading. For $75 the shirts are good, not great. I wish I wouldn't have ordered the white one.

title: Been using Queensboro for over 20…
text: Been using Queensboro for over 20 years. They are great for small businesses like mine. After a couple of year absence due to the global pandemic I finally had a need for some new shirts. I placed my order and had a little over 2 weeks lead time till in needed them. I received my order acknowledgment and the “ship date” was a couple days before my “need date” so I contacted on line customer service as it is so hard to get a real person on the phone any more. I simply asked if I could pay to get my shipment upgrade to an overnight delivery to insure I would have them on time? The on line customer service replied and stated that the “ship date” is not guaranteed and is an estimate…and then stated they could not change the shipping to overnight. Then they asked if I wanted to cancel or proceed with my order? Almost seemed as though they did not want my business anymore? I told them to move forward with the order but frankly I was not very happy with their answers or customer service and would think twice about placing future orders with them. Less than a week after I confirmed to move forward with the order I get another email stating my entire order was now 3 days ahead of the “schedule date” and that it would be shipping priority overnight at no additional expense to me. Guess maybe Fred Meyer or someone within the organization was made aware of my discontent and made an effort to make a 20+ year customer happy. Kudos to all and thanks for the “extra effort” to make a customer happy. Maybe next transaction it will be a 5 star rating.

title: Thank You Queensboro for Standing Behind Your Products!
text: This is my 4th order with Queensboro but I have to say, I am disappointed with the length of time it is taking to get my order.  I placed the order on December 2nd.  7 days later, I get an email asking me to confirm the order.  The expected delivery date was December 30th (4 weeks after the initial order date). On January 2nd, I call customer service to inquire about my order.  I was told there was some damage done and quality control requested a few items to be reproduced due to the threading not being up to standard.  I was also told they were waiting on a couple more items to be completed.  I understand with the holidays to be backed up, but my order just came in today and not only is it 9 days late, one of my orders is missing! 5 weeks for an order is simply too long for my business to wait for products and items are missing.I am undecided if I will order again due to the time it takes to get the products delivered, and also, the stitching is inconsistent in quality on this order.  I just downgraded my review to 1 star since items are missing even after I called to check on the delay.  Not good.***UPDATE***Customer service called to talk about my experience and made me feel a lot better about Queensboro.  Not only do they stand behind their products, but they also assured me the entire order will be replaced no questions asked.  They made no excuses and explained how things like this can happen. As a business owner, I have made mistakes and I own up to them.  This isn't my first order with them and have been satisfied every time up until this experience. After speaking with Erik, he told me what steps they are taking to speed up production time. Thanks, Erik for your phone call.  I will continue to be a customer!
